name: Swapnil51087.github.io
body:
# Swapnil Pancholi

## Education 
### Master of Science: Software Engineering,                                       GPA: 3.9/4.0
San Jose State University,									              Expected 2015
     
### Bachelor of Technology: Computer Engineering,                	                GPA: 3.6/4.0
Jaipur Engineering College and Research Center,				                             	         July 2010

## Skills 

### Programming Languages- 
_Java, Python, SQL_
### Frameworks and Tools Used - 
_Apache Hadoop, Eclipse, Teradata 13.10, Oracle 10g, Android SDK, SAP Business Objects,   Web Services, CouchDB_
### Operating Systems - 
_Linux, Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows server 2000, Windows server 2003_

## Experience

### VCE - Student Intern									       June 2014 - Present
•	_Designed and developed an application which consumes SOAP APIs to automate the process of updating the order and licensing data into Flexera._
_•	Developed an application to automate the process of updating and mapping files to the associated components and VBlocks facilitating clients to download the newer version of the product with every release. _
_•	Developed an application which enables the administrators to keep a track of end of life cycle, latest version and release number of various active components of a product._

     _ Technologies and Frameworks Used_ - Java, SOAP Web services, Microsoft SQL, Eclipse.
             
### Accenture Services Pvt. Ltd. - Senior Programmer and Data Analyst			             April 2011 – July 2013
•	_Developed an application to find and delete the stale users from Business Objects repository. _
_•	Developed weekly batch script to move old data to archives._
_•	Worked on the capacity planning and upgrade of Business Objects application from XIR2 to XI3.1._
_•	Implemented enterprise security setup of Business Objects and synchronize the application with LDAP directory._
_•	Developed and maintained portal application which is used to run business performance reports_

     _Technologies and Frameworks Used_ - Java, Teradata, Oracle, Eclipse, Business Objects.

### Tavant Technologies Pvt. Ltd.  - Trainee					                       Jan 2011 – Apr 2011
•	_Developed Interface for the HR management tool._
_•	Create Sample DB for the HR management application._

## Projects
### Big data Analytics of music using MapReduce programming model 
_Developed MapReduce scripts which is used to filter millions of songs on the basis of attributes such as tempo, loudness, era etc. and resulting in a dataset used to recommend songs to the users._
         _Technologies Used_: Apache Hadoop, Python

### Android application development
_Developed Android application enabling users to define the audio mode of cell phone when it is connected to a specific Wi-Fi network. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wifi.volumecontroller_
          _Technologies Used_ - Android SDK, Java, XML, SQLite

### Restful APIS development 
_Developed Restful APIS to implement the server infrastructure for a client to use on social networking website._
          _Technologies Used_ – Python, Bottle micro framework, CouchDB

### Bike racing game    
__Developed a racing game using Greenfoot. Please refer to the following page for details. _
_http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qVoKA2kWWWc__

## Accomplishments
•	_Awarded with highest performance rating among peers for the performance year 2011 - 2012 at Accenture Services._
_•	Won National prize for designing low cost water purifier system._
